Sheâ€™s been my Girlfriend for (nowyear - 2016) years. We love each other and care about each other. And we hope we can get everyoneâ€™s blessing. Exactly, Itâ€™s time to let everyone know the truth about the relationship between us. Finally, I gotta tell you guys that I got a mountain of peach treesğŸ˜.

Our_Time_Together

2020-9

  • She was admitted to the Beijing Film Academy.

2018-9

  • I was admitted to the China Three Gorges University.

2016-8

  • We first met on a TV series called A Love For Separation in August 2016. Since then, I feel like Iâ€™ve fallen in love.
